resource.chars:
Military 1844 Department 
No 3
Letter from the Superintendent 
Magnetic Observatory at Madras 
To the Secretary to Government 
10th January 1844.
With an Enclosure 
Referred to in Military Letter 
to England dated 26 March 
1844 No. 16 Para 1.
Reports the result of his 
journey to the South for the 
purpose of observing the 
Solar eclipse on the 21st
December 1843 he has taken 
the opportunity of making 
observations of the Dip 
and Horizontal Intensity 
at certain places on hi 
return.
Recd via Southampton 
11th May 1844
